oai_dc:dc.dc:title: United Confederate Veterans reunion souvenir medal
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This brass U.C.V. souvenir medal belonged to Pvt. Lewis Cole, Co. B, 55th Tenn. (Brown's) Inf., CSA. The front of the medal has the image of Gen. Robert E. Lee. The reverse side has three Confederate flags.; Cole was born in 1836 in Benton County, Tenn. and died in 1925 in Paris, Tenn.
